RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 7F Turf CR: 79. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 16 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SLIPPERY WHEN WET went evenly through the backside angling while advancing to upper stretch surging up late in the six path. SHOSHA tracked the pace bidding to a clear lead near mid track in upper stretch digging in late ceding to outside pressure in the end. QUANTUM THEORY slow early swung out to upper stretch vying late while seven wide. FOOL FOR THE CITY herded foe at the break rushing to set the pace on a narrow lead ceding in upper stretch wearing down late. BOURBON TALKING played no factor. HAPPY YEARS was never involved. LITTLE VAQUERO pressured the pace to the far turn wearing out into upper stretch. PRETTY LOUD was herded at the break. ANGELUS DIAMOND folded up early.

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Years
ENTRY.OWNER: O'Sullivan Farms LLC and Shaver Stephen
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Talking
ENTRY.OWNER: Quarter Pole Investments LLC and Fletcher Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Slippery When Wet
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, angled out gaining to lane, up late 6 wide,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kirt Cahill, Sarah Cahill, Dr. John C.Weed Jr.

ENTRY.NAME: Angelus Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up early

ENTRY.NAME: Quantum Theory
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P Burnsworth Richard and Buyea Kristina
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung out to lane, vied late 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Loud
ENTRY.COMMENT: herded at the break

ENTRY.NAME: Fool for the City
ENTRY.COMMENT: herded foe break, pressed narrow lead, wore down late

ENTRY.NAME: Little Vaquero
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Shosha
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, bid clear upper stretch, grudgingly wide pressure

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 100. Allowance Purse 28600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 16 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, Or Starter Races Not Considered) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023). (If necessar y will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLYING SCOTSMAN stalked the pace looming to upper stretch wresting the lead in the six path an eighth out angling in while edging clear late. ZERO GRAVITY slow early saved ground swinging past a bevy of foes leaving the turn running on seven wide a willing second best. DARK OAK stalked the pace pressing to a short lead near mid track in upper stretch wearing under outside pressure there. SHY GUY a step slow to the far turn circled out nine wide in upper stretch moving up with an even finish. EDEN PARADISE stalked the pace moving in traffic to the far turn clipping heels bobbling outside the three eighths pole. HUNTER SCOTT stalked the pace chasing along the inside to upper stretch weakening late. TAMANRASSETT hustled out set a pressured pace through the turn dueling into upper stretch weakening late on the inside. ENERGIZER pressured the pace to the far turn tiring in upper stretch. OUTLIER tracked the early pace then flattened out on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Tamanrassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled out, set pace, dueled to lane, spent late

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Gravity
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, angled out to lane, ran on 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Hunter Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, extended lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Eden Paradise
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, boxed in to far turn, clip heels bobbled 3/8

ENTRY.NAME: Shy Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, circled nine wide lane, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Energizer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Scotsman
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed to lane, led 6 wide, angled in, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed to lane, dug in 4-5 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Outlier
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked early, flattened out to lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 16 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Al lowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS BETTY hesitated breaking lagged early circling out on the turn coming six wide down the lane getting up late with a big finish. BIG TREAT pressured the pace dueling through the turn wresting a clear lead in upper stretch being run down from the outside at the wire. GLADRIEL pressured the pace dueling through the turn ceding to rival in upper stretch coming up a touch short. QUEEN OF CLASS dropped off on the turn. IRON BERTIE flashed early speed then gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Treat
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled turn, clear lane, run down late

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke late, circled out turn, six wide lane, big finish

ENTRY.NAME: Queen of Class
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Gladriel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on turn, ceded lane, touch short

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DON'T LOOK UP stalked the pace looming near mid track in upper stretch rallying to a clear lead holding late. MARPIN slow early lost ground to upper stretch coming on late six wide. BABY BONNIE slow early raced evenly to upper stretch finishing well on the inside. HER TIME IS NOW sent clear set the pace to upper stretch digging in from the four path faltering late. GLO GIRL GLO raced evenly off the pace playing no factor. ADMIRAL ALLIE was always outrun. NIKITA showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Bonnie
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, evenly to lane, finished well inside

ENTRY.NAME: Glo Girl Glo
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Admiral Allie
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Her Time Is Now
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, dug in lane, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Nikita
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Marpin
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, came on late 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Look Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed mid track lane, rallied up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VASY SAYS NYET away alertly set the pace being pressed through the turn digging in in the inside down the lane finding more late. RED GUN chased early pressing in bid on the turn extending on the outside down the lane being denied at the end. ANDYLITHIC chased the pace racing evenly to upper stretch making no headway there holding position. KNOCKOUT GUY slow early lagged to upper stretch passing a few there. DENNIS'S PRIDE lunged at the break, played no factor. CALIFORNIA EMERALD faded on the turn. ANGELA'S ANGEL was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Andylithic
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, evenly to lane, held spot

ENTRY.NAME: California Emerald
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Angela's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Knockout Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, passed a few there

ENTRY.NAME: Vasy Says Nyet
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, dug in lane, found more inside

ENTRY.NAME: Red Gun
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early pressing bid on turn, extended lane, held off

ENTRY.NAME: Dennis's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged break, evenly, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 16 Allowed 3 lbs. C laiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIKE SEGAL pressured the pace wresting a clear lead on the turn, passed in upper stretch would rally from mid track to prevail. DRIVE BY LAYOVER chased the pace wresting a short lead along the inside in upper stretch ceding to wide pressure late. MASAI MAN pressed then chased on the turn racing five wide down the lane moving evenly late. SIR AGGRAVATOR hustled in pursuit through the turn raced six wide down the lane finishing evenly. LAUTREC raced evenly throughout lacking more. MAMBA TWENTY FOUR slow early raced wide to upper stretch. DARK HEDGES took a step on the turn pulling up and walking off after the race. PER RULING #122 FROM THE WEST VIRGINIA RACING COMMISSION, MASAI MAN WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM 3rd TO UNPLACED FOR BEING INELIGIBLE TO START.

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Hedges
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and TEC Racing (Elliott S Logan)
ENTRY.COMMENT: bad step, pulled up, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Lautrec
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Drive by Layover
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, led upper stretch, ceded to wode pressure

ENTRY.NAME: Mamba Twenty Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Like Segal
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led on turn, passed from inside lane, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Masai Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, chased to lane, evenly late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Aggravator
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the pace 5 wide lane, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 16 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INCESSANT pressed up three deep at the quarter pole wresting the lead in upper stretch drawing off for a convincing win. ORBIT MARS pressed the pace dueling from the rail to upper stretch being overpowered there angling off the inside late saving place. JILL BABE chased the pace racing four wide down the lane finishing evenly. ACCOLADES GALORE saved ground to upper stretch finishing evenly along the rail. MY LOVELY GIRL pressed the pace dueling between horses at the quarter pole fading in upper stretch. SASSY JUSTICE was bumped and in tight at the break. TUNSTALL was bumped lightly and in close at the break.

ENTRY.NAME: Accolades Galore
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, finished evenly on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Incessant
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed up three deep 1/4 pole, led top lane, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Jill Babe
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 4 wide lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped in tight break

ENTRY.NAME: Tunstall
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped in tight break

ENTRY.NAME: Orbit Mars
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on rail to lane, no match, angled out

ENTRY.NAME: My Lovely Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Baird, John W. and Harbison, Rex
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, between horses 1/4 pole, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 16 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOTTA MOSCATO stalked the pace through the turn rallying to draw even in upper stretch dueling abreast foe down the lane getting up gamely. LUNAR PRAYER away alertly set the pace through the turn being hooked from the outside in upper stretch battling step for step to the wire. MAYSVILLE MISS stalked the pace through the turn chasing down the stretch closing the gap late. MY BRIDGET VERDOT slow early lagged to upper stretch finding best stride late. SPEEDY FIRE raced evenly gaining some late. NOT SHY was bumped at the break. DEL MAR WOMAN played no factor. QUITCHERSNIVELIN was never involved. GOTTA HAVE FAITH was always outrun. TEQUILA SUNSET raced mid pack giving way to upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Del Mar Woman
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Gotta Have Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, gained some late

ENTRY.NAME: Maysville Miss
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, edged closer late

ENTRY.NAME: Quitchersnivelin
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Not Shy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped at the break

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Sunset
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Lunar Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, hooked top lane, dueled on inside to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Lotta Moscato
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drew even upper stretch, dueled abreast, got up

ENTRY.NAME: My Bridget Verdot
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, found best stride late
